mapper.select: SELECT A.BZ_NAME AS BZNAME , A.BZ_INTRODUCE AS BZINTRODUCE ,A.BZ_FL AS BZFL, A.SRC_NAME AS SRCNAME , A.ID AS ID FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE A

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BZ_FL=#{bzfl}
AND A.BZ_NAME LIKE "%"#{bzname}"%"

SELECT A.BZ_NAME AS BZNAME , A.BZ_INTRODUCE AS BZINTRODUCE , A.SRC_NAME AS SRCNAME , A.ID AS ID FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE A WHERE 1=1
AND A.ID =#{authorId}

SELECT CJXJ_DETAIL.TITLE AS TITLE , CJXJ.SRC_NAME AS IMAGEURL , CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE AS PUBDATE , CJXJ_DETAIL.LINKURL AS LINKURL, CJXJ.ID AS ID FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_DETAIL_TABLE CJXJ_DETAIL , CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE CJXJ WHERE 1=1 AND CJXJ_DETAIL.ID = #{id} AND CJXJ.ID = CJXJ_DETAIL.ID ORDER BY CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_DETAIL_TABLE CJXJ_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND CJXJ_DETAIL.ID = #{id}

SELECT CJXJ_DETAIL.TITLE AS TITLE , CJXJ.SRC_NAME AS IMAGEURL , CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE AS PUBDATE , CJXJ_DETAIL.LINKURL AS LINKURL, CJXJ.ID AS ID FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_DETAIL_TABLE CJXJ_DETAIL , CJXJ_RESOURCE_TABLE CJXJ WHERE 1=1 AND CJXJ.ID = CJXJ_DETAIL.ID AND DATE(CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE) = CURDATE() ORDER BY CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CJXJ_RESOURCE_DETAIL_TABLE CJXJ_DETAIL WHERE DATE(CJXJ_DETAIL.PUBDATE) = CURDATE()
